decks.notes: This deck focuses on a variety of control elements to disrupt the opponent's strategy while using Niv-Mizzet Reborn as a powerful card advantage engine. The deck includes a wide range of removal spells, counterspells, and versatile cards to handle different threats. The companion Yorion, Sky Nomad adds additional value with its ability to blink permanents for extra value. The mana base is diverse to support the deck's multicolor nature, allowing for flexibility in casting spells. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent through efficient control strategies.

The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a mix of creatures and removal spells to control the board. Cards like Reckoner Bankbuster and Bloodtithe Harvester put pressure on the opponent while Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provides card advantage. Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord helps buff your creatures and Vein Ripper can quickly finish off opponents. With a mix of creatures, removal, and a strong planeswalker, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and close out the game quickly.

The main concept of this deck is to apply constant pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. It aims to control the board early with cards like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize while steadily building up its board presence with creatures like Bloodtithe Harvester and Gifted Aetherborn. The deck also utilizes cards like Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord and Vein Ripper to enhance its creatures and push through damage. The inclusion of cards like Bitter Triumph and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provide additional control and card advantage to keep the pressure on the opponent.

This deck focuses on maintaining control of the game by utilizing counterspells, removal, and card advantage to outlast opponents. It also includes a companion, Kaheera, the Orphanguard, to provide additional value. The deck includes a mix of lands that can produce white and blue mana, along with powerful spells like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, Supreme Verdict, and Dig Through Time to help stay ahead in the game. The key to this deck is to play patiently and strategically to ensure victory by outmaneuvering opponents.

This deck focuses on utilizing Lotus Field to generate a large amount of mana quickly to cast powerful spells and win the game in a single turn. It includes cards that can tutor for Lotus Field, untap it, and generate extra mana, along with powerful spells like Omniscience and Emergent Ultimatum to overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes interaction and protection cards to ensure the combo can go off smoothly without being disrupted. Overall, the goal is to assemble the combo pieces efficiently and overwhelm the opponent with a powerful finish.

This deck focuses on an aggressive strategy that utilizes sacrificing creatures and generating value through various sacrifice synergies. The deck includes cards like Witch's Oven, Mayhem Devil, Cauldron Familiar, and Claim the Firstborn to take advantage of sacrificing your own creatures and disrupting your opponent's game plan. The inclusion of Jegantha as a companion offers additional flexibility and consistency to the deck's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent by continually sacrificing and generating value while controlling the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize.

This deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with instants and sorceries to bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard for repeated attacks. Spells like Consider, Opt, Sleight of Hand, and Fiery Impulse help dig through the deck and fill up the graveyard, while cards like Ledger Shredder and Picklock Prankster assist in enabling the Phoenix's revival. With a mix of evasion and disruption, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with aggressive plays and consistent Phoenix presence on the battlefield.

This deck focuses on using Transmogrify to convert creatures into powerful threats like Mirrex or Atraxa, Grand Unifier. The goal is to disrupt the opponent's strategy with hand disruption spells like Duress and Thoughtseize while controlling the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and Extinction Event. The deck also includes ways to protect your own creatures and generate value with cards like Reckoner Bankbuster and Sokenzan, Crucible of Defiance. Ultimately, the deck aims to outvalue and overwhelm the opponent with its powerful combo pieces.

The deck focuses on using a variety of control spells and effects to disrupt the opponent's strategy while also generating value through token production and card advantage. The inclusion of Yorion as a companion allows for additional resources and flexibility in long games. The deck aims to stall the game with removal spells and counterspells until it can overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats like Elspeth, Sun's Champion and Gideon, Ally of Zendikar. The mana base is designed to support the diverse range of spells and ensure consistent access to different colors of mana.
